slides.heading: CMS
slides.text: SvelteCMS lives in your repository and runs on your website.

slides.heading: content
slides.text: SvelteCMS stores your content in markdown files, JSON objects, or databases. Mix, match, and even migrate[*](#_) providers with ease.

slides.heading: hosting
slides.text: Build static, dynamic, or mixed sites for any provider that supports SvelteKit.

slides.heading: media
slides.text: SvelteCMS integrates seamlessly[*](#_)  with many[*](#_) storage and streaming providers, taking the hassle out of managing your media.

slides.heading: prototyping
slides.text: SvelteCMS builds speedy web apps with complex custom data structures--*no coding necessary*[*](#_).

slides.heading: plugins
slides.text: Extend SvelteCMS functionality with an ecosystem[*](#_) of plugins, or use its stable[*](#_) and elegant[*](#_) API to build your own.

slides.heading: language
slides.text: For styling, SvelteCMS will accept Svelte components, markdown, tailwind[*](#_), sass[*](#_), or even plain old CSS.

slides.heading: budget
slides.text: SvelteCMS is *100% free and open source*--and it always will be!
